Arrow of Cacophony.name: Arrow of Cacophony
Arrow of Cacophony.fullText:
Euphonic Bow Attack 11Arrow of Cacophony

Your shot releases a blast of sound that overwhelms your foe.

Encounter        Arcane, Thunder, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target is deafened and dazed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 19.
Arrow of Cacophony.flavor: Your shot releases a blast of sound that overwhelms your foe.
Arrow of Cacophony.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target is deafened and dazed until the end of your next turn.

Song of Sonic Striking.name: Song of Sonic Striking
Song of Sonic Striking.fullText:
Euphonic Bow Utility 12Song of Sonic Striking

You hum a low tone that reverberates in the air, warping the flight of your arrows so that they speed true to their marks.

Daily        Arcane, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, your attacks with a bow ignore cover and concealment, including superior cover but not total concealment.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 19.
Song of Sonic Striking.flavor: You hum a low tone that reverberates in the air, warping the flight of your arrows so that they speed true to their marks.
Song of Sonic Striking.effect: Until the stance ends, your attacks with a bow ignore cover and concealment, including superior cover but not total concealment.

Anthem of Antagonism.name: Anthem of Antagonism
Anthem of Antagonism.fullText:
Euphonic Bow Attack 20Anthem of Antagonism

Your foe’s offenses return to it as a wailing storm that engulfs its allies while your bow shots repay its evil deeds in full.

Daily        Arcane, Thunder, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier thunder damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: The target is affected by your anthem of antagonism (save ends). While it is affected by the anthem, at the start of each of your turns, the target is the center of a burst 5 explosion of clashing noise. Each enemy in the burst takes thunder damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. You gain a power bonus to the attack roll of your next ranged weapon attack on that turn equal to the number of enemies that take damage in this way.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 19.
Anthem of Antagonism.flavor: Your foe’s offenses return to it as a wailing storm that engulfs its allies while your bow shots repay its evil deeds in full.
Anthem of Antagonism.effect: The target is affected by your anthem of antagonism (save ends). While it is affected by the anthem, at the start of each of your turns, the target is the center of a burst 5 explosion of clashing noise. Each enemy in the burst takes thunder damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. You gain a power bonus to the attack roll of your next ranged weapon attack on that turn equal to the number of enemies that take damage in this way.
